# Insanity (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[Charm (Domain)|Charm 7]], [[Corruption (Domain)|Corruption 7]], [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 14]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 301

The affected creature suffers from a continuous *[[Confusion (Spell)|confusion]]* effect, as the spell.

*[[Remove Curse (Spell)|Remove curse]]* does not remove *insanity. [[Restoration, Greater (Spell)|Greater restoration]], [[Heal (Spell)|heal]], [[Limited Wish (Spell)|limited wish]], [[Miracle (Spell)|miracle]],* or *[[Wish (Spell)|wish]]* can restore the creature.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Corruption 7 to Level per *Fiendish Codex I.*
